mapper.select: SELECT rnum, T.* FROM ( SELECT commonId, memberId, boardDate, title, content, viewCnt, imageFileName, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY originNo desc, groupLayer asc) as rnum FROM common) T WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startList} AND #{endList}

SELECT rnum, T.* FROM ( SELECT commonId, memberId, boardDate, title, content, viewCnt, imageFileName, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY originNo desc, groupLayer asc) as rnum FROM common) T WHERE memberId = #{id} and rnum BETWEEN #{pagination.startList} AND #{pagination.endList}
mapper.insert: insert into common(commonId, memberId, title, content, imageFileName, originNo, groupOrd, groupLayer) values(seq_common_commonId.nextval, #{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seq_common_commonId.nextval, #{groupOrd}, #{groupLayer})

insert into common(commonId, memberId, title, content, imageFileName, originNo, groupOrd, groupLayer) values(seq_common_commonId.nextval, #{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originNo}, #{groupOrd}, #{groupLayer})
mapper.select: select count(*) as listCnt from common
select count(*) as listCnt from common where memberId = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from common where originNo = #{originNo} and groupLayer >= #{groupLayer}
mapper.update: update common set viewCnt = viewCnt + 1 where commonId = #{commonId}
